title: 求個train and zeppelin mod的懶人包
author: windsword
txt_content:

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
完成了 http://115.com/file/clsozi2a

加压后把minecraft.jar扔进 %appdata%/.minecraft/bin 里
resources放进 %appdata%/.minecraft 里

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 唉, 找了一會兒, 沒找到其他可下載的... 只能等原作者更新網頁了...
